author: Alex Wong
comment: Awesome pixel art watch face. Glad to see the developer listening to feedback. Now the only thing missing is an optional square face. For square watches, at a minimum it would be nice to have the option of coloring the portion around the circular face black.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. In new 2.0.0 you can customize watch colors, display date and show battery indicator.

author: scottandem03
comment: Cool face. Matches my s7 pixel theme, but date option will not show even when enabled. Would give 5 stars if it did.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: It should work, it has been thoroughly tested. If you tested it on 1st of June, it could be that you did notice the date indicator on the right side, because in case if it is 1, it is just a simple "|" line on the right. :) Could you please check that?

title: Date won't enable.

author: Nicolas Giraud
comment: It's not bad, but I'd like to customize colors with a color picker UI. Also square watches support is really barebones, the clock contour line should be square, it would look much better. I'll gladly update my rating if updates implement these features.

author: John Moquin
comment: But needs a way to customize the colors beyond the preset options. A simple RGB slider would do the trick. More importantly, however, is that Ambient Mode doesn't show notifications/cards.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: Now in version 2.0.0, you have this option. Are you sure, that this is worth only 2/5 stars?

title: Kinda Cool

author: Dom Wingfield
comment: Really cute, easily readable, looks great. A second hand would be great though.
title: Awesome little watch face

author: Jpansta
comment: I love this watch face and use it all the time but there absolutely needs to be more color options for for hands and backgrounds! Aside from that it's perfect!
title: Awesome!

author: Brodie
comment: Although wish we had more options the the one black and white face when in powersave mode
title: Love it!

author: Josh Shields
comment: It makes me feel like I'm wearing a watch straight from a video game. In my opinion, the watch faces that try to emulate the appearance of a real watch are tacky. On the other hand, this has a charming and unique look. It fits with the context of a smart watch. My only critique is that I wish the colors could be changed.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. Please see the new version 2.0.0, where you can customize colors (among other watch features).

title: Love the look

author: Rob Robeson
comment: This is my favorite watch face by far. It definitely stands out and is super bright. I do miss having a date indicator, but it really wouldn't fit this design.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback. In version 2.0.0 we have added the possibility to display date - you can display it or not.

title: Amazing watch face!

author: Simon Green
comment: Very unique. Please bring colour change options.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. In new 2.0.0 you can customize watch colors, display date and show battery indicator.

author: paulo verde
comment: I like it :-) don't know what its like on the battery as I've only just purchased it.60p though happy days! Lg g watch r.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: I hope it will serve you well. In interactive mode the watch refreshes every 3 seconds, and all the graphics are very optimized - all the pointers and other stuff is minimial resolution to save the resources. Furthermore, as it is not generated with any watchface generators, it has a minimal possible implementation to further save the resources.

title: ⌚

author: Larry Anderson
comment: Has a Terraria feel. Love it!

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback. I think you will also like the Rainbow Stars Animated watch we have just released. Try it :)
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aarieer.rainbowstars

Thank you for supporting our work.

title: Very cool

author: Taras Anatsko
comment: Love the style, but it seems that it's not supported on square watches. I bought it but can't find anywhere so I refunded back.

reply.author: Aarieer
reply.content: I am sorry to hear that the watch did not appear. The watchface was tested also for square devices and now in the new version also for different resolutions. After intallation, users should wait a few moments for the watch to synchronize with a device.
